font.marquee: All schools and activities are canceled through the remainder of the school year. We will continue with remote learning opportunities.

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 21:35 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly clear, with a low around 32. North wind around 5 mph becoming calm in the evening.

A 30 percent chance of showers after 4pm. Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. Breezy, with a west southwest wind 5 to 10 mph increasing to 15 to 20 mph in the afternoon. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.

A 30 percent chance of showers and thunderstorms before 1am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 32. West southwest wind around 15 mph becoming north northwest after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 30 mph.

font.bgcolor: All schools and activities are canceled through the remainder of the school year. We will continue with remote learning opportunities.
